subject: VAM Pro with 3pcs and 3 clutch model suports
description_text:
Hi dear SimSonn,

Can I buy Reator háptico de feedback de vibração de motor linear SIMSONN VAM e VAM Pro para pedais Pro X Ultra ou Plus X (sem caixa de controle) - AliExpress 34<https://pt.aliexpress.com/item/1005009187581445.html?spm=a2g0o.store_pc_home.promoteWysiwyg_2004486230731.1005009187581445&gatewayAdapt=glo2bra#nav-specification> VAM Pro with 3pcs and 3 clutch model suports? Can you give me a link?

Thanks in advance,

Hugo.

conversations.body_text: Hi Hugo Rinaldi Filho,      The horizontal mounting bracket version of Haptics is available for purchase on the official website.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730
